replies.body:
I use the Steelseries Sibera V3 headset.

I strongly recommend it for people who want a headset with a mic that has decent quality.
The headphones themselves are also on par. 

It's definitely worth saving your money for in my opinion.
replies.body_tagged:
I use the Steelseries Sibera V3 headset.

I strongly recommend it for people who want a headset with a mic that has decent quality.
The headphones themselves are also on par. 

It's definitely worth saving your money for in my opinion.

replies.body: If it's not gaming headphones, then you really should get a decent pair of headphones for just listening to music. You really won't get the full experience of music without a decent pair of headphones, and you'll learn to appreciate music much more if you had one :P

replies.body:
Kids at my school be like "Oh I got beats11!1"

1) Their sound quality is HORRIBLE (A logitech is better)
2) They cost like 5x more than a logitech gaming headset, and the logitech is much better.
3) The ads... Lies

Gaming = Better than beats.

(My opinion)

replies.body:
For games like CSGO there is a big improvement, but once you get over $200 or so it doesn't improve much

I'm not competitive at gaming, I bought these to enjoy music :P I listen to music 8 hours a day so I want to get the best experience I can (once you try expensive headphones listening to music with normal headphones feels so wrong)
